page.title: 07BIKES AND CARS
page.content: We have found out in our class how many children have bikes.{23}children in our class that live in the area have bikes, and{3}children haven't. { {11}children have{2}bikes,{2}children{ have{3}bikes but no-one has{4}bikes. There are lots of different types of bikes; the most popular bike is the { {BMX.}BMX stands for{BIYCLE MOTO CROSS. { BMXING}originally started in the USA. It was brought into{Britain}in about{1982.}We have got most of the different makes of{BMX}like{Mongoose, {Max Star, Pro Star, Rally Burner}and{ {Red Line.} We have found out that all the families in our school have{cars.}They own may different kinds, such as{Ford, {Vauxhall, Toyota, Nissan}and{British {Leyland.}Because{Bulphan}is quite remote we need cars to visit nearby towns to go shopping.
